package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	var m = map[string]int{
		"A": 21,
		"B": 22,
		"C": 23,
	}
	counter := 0
	for k, v := range m {
		if counter == 0 {
			delete(m, "A")
		}
		counter++
		fmt.Println(k, v)
	}
	fmt.Println("counter is ", counter)
}

func main() {
    ch := make(chan int, 1000)
    go func() {
        for i := 0; i < 10; i++ {
            ch <- i
        }
    }()
    go func() {
        for {
            a, ok := <-ch
            if !ok {
                fmt.Println("close")
                return
            }
            fmt.Println("a: ", a)
        }
    }()
    close(ch)
    fmt.Println("ok")
    time.Sleep(time.Second * 100)
}

func main() {
    ch := make(chan int, 1000)
    go func() {
        for i := 0; i < 10; i++ {
            ch <- i
        }
    }()
    go func() {
        for {
            a, ok := <-ch
            if !ok {
                fmt.Println("close")
                return
            }
            fmt.Println("a: ", a)

    }()
    close(ch)

    time.Sleep(time.Second * 100)
}
